show_name: Dark Shell: Lust in the Cage (OAV)
other_title: Dark Shell - Ori no Naka no Namameki (Japanese)
ダーク・シェル 檻の中の艶 (Japanese)
plot: A gang of soldiers have their way with women are under their protection. The women and the soldiers are trapped in enemy territory, and they must find a way to rejoin their main force if they are to survive the war.
